channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Griffis Business Park Tour & Luncheon | July 16
item.description: Join us for the 2025 Griffiss Business Park Tour on July 16 in Rome NY. This experience includes visits to leading tech and research organizations such as the Air Force Research Lab and Innovare Advancement Center. Students will also have the opportunity to connect with RPI alumni at a networking lunch at NYSTEC. Registration is required by June 15. Transportation is provided. When: Wednesday, July 16, 2025 9-5PM Where: Union Circle Register by June 15th: https://registration.socio.events/e/rpi
item.author: Students

item.title: School of Science Arch Field Trip: American Museum of Natural History | June 14
item.description: Date: Saturday, June 14, 2025 6:00 AM - 7:30 PM - ALL MAJORS WELCOME! Students will be able to view all the ticketed exhibits, including “Encounters in the Milky Way” Space Show, “Invisible Worlds” Immersive Experience, the Butterfly Vivarium, “The Secret World of Elephants”, “World Beyond Earth” Giant-Screen Film and “Life at the Limits: Nature’s Superheroes”. Breakfast and lunch will be provided. Meet at RPI Union horseshoe entrance at 6:00 AM, bus departure at 6:30 AM. Bus will return to RPI…

item.title: Prep Session for the Capital Region Careers Networking Night | June 18
item.description: Are you planning to attend the Capital Region Careers Networking Night or other networking events in the future? Come to this workshop in the CCPD Office onJune 18 from 12-1 PM to learn more about how to interact with employers, recruiters, and other professionals at events. Register in Handshake!

item.title: Outdoor Professional Headshots with the CCPD | June 18
item.description: Are you a student looking to update your professional profile or need a fresh headshot? Join the CCPD for outdoor headshot session on Wednesday, June 18th 2025 between 1 - 2PM! Don’t miss this opportunity to get a polished, professional photo taken in a beautiful outdoor setting.

item.title: 2025 RAA Annual Meeting (Virtual) | June 17
item.description: Date: 6/17/2025 7:00 PM to 8:00 PM The Rensselaer Alumni Association (RAA) will hold its annual meeting and election on Tuesday, June 17 at 7 p.m. Eastern Time. Once again, the annual meeting will be held in a virtual format. During the meeting, the RAA will share a recap of the last year, discuss plans for the upcoming year, and review the 2025 Board member slate and bylaw amendments.

item.title: Fidelity Confidential Consultation (In Person) | June 16
item.description: Date: Monday, June 16, 2025 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM - Schedule a confidential consultation to help you become better informed and more confident about your workplace retirement savings plan benefits. To schedule an appointment, call 1-800-642-7131, Monday through Friday, 8:00 am to midnight, or online at https://nb.fidelity.com/public/nbpreloginnav/rpi/microsite/#/tem/meet-with-us

item.title: MBA for Professionals Information Session with Rensselaer at Work | June 17
item.description: Date: Tuesday, June 17, 2025 7:00 PM - 7:30 PM - Learn to lead from every aspect of an organization with a real-world MBA experience. Prepare to lead the most dynamic and innovative organizations. Engage, involve, motivate, and lead others to reach their fullest potential. Join Rensselaer Dean Aric Krause, Ph. D., as he reviews this innovative project-based, online MBA for professionals program. Please register to receive login details to join this virtual event.

item.title: Reminder for the Campus Card Office
item.description:
If your department has any Guest, Contractor, or Vendor cards expiring on or before July 1, 2025, please renew them by June 30 to avoid any access disruptions. Visit the Campus Card Office webpage and fill out an Access Request Form to renew any cards. Questions? We’re happy to help! Contact us at campuscard@rpi.edu. Thanks for your attention and cooperation!
